### Information about the course site

This page provides an outline of the topics, contents, and assignments for the semester. Please note that the contents of the course sessions ({{< bi book >}} background information, {{< bi file-earmark-slides >}} slides, {{< bi pencil-square >}} exercises and {{< bi file-earmark-code >}} tutorials) will be updated continuously throughout the semester, with all changes being documented here.
:::

::: callout-important
## Focus of the current course

The seminar in the winter term 2025/26 focuses on the empirical study of **outdoor advertising in public spaces** â€“ from systematic documentation to content-related and data-based analysis. Participants will develop and test their own research designs to capture advertising formats, motives, and potential effects. For more information, please refer to the [syllabus](/course-syllabus.html#focus-of-the-current-course).
:::
